titleStmt.title: Commune Conciliu[m] tentum in camera Guildhald ciuit. London, vicesimo primo die Ianuarij, anno regni Dom. nostri Iacobi dei gratia, Angliæ, Franciæ, & Hib. Regis, fidei defensor. &c. octauo, & Scotiæ xliiij. Cora[m] Willielmo Crauen Milite Maiore Ciuit. Lon. ... An acte for reformation of apparell to be vvorne by prentices, and maid-seruants vvithin the citty of London, and the liberties thereof.
Acts & Orders. 1611-01-21
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
